channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Yiming Xu

item.title: Retrieval-based Question Answering with Passage Expansion Using a Knowledge Graph
item.description: A retrieval QA method that expands passages with KG context to improve recall and answer quality.

item.title: Fine-grained label learning via siamese network for cross-modal information retrieval
item.description: Mining hard negatives to improve cross-modal information retrieval.
